Reviews.Title: Hate it
Reviews.Author: Wild 4 u
Reviews.Content: It was a toss up between the Blackberry and the Sony Aspen. I chose the Aspen. Big mistake.1. Poor battery usage - if Wi-Fi is on as well as Bluetooth, expect a couple of hours use.2. The phone switches to voicemail in mid conversation, when you put it to your ear.3. The white Aspen - Keys light up white against a white background, so you can't see the keys in daytime.4. If someone is calling you when you are on a call and you press answer, it cuts you off. Most irritating.5. Operates on Windows - need I say more.6. Touchscreen scratches very easily. Even with provided stylus.My daughter is getting this phone to play with and I'm buying a Blackberry 9780. At least I can message my friends for free.
